spiritsExplanation:
The workout titled "Bootcamp HIIT Row" and described as "Hit short intervals at high intensities" clearly indicates a high-intensity interval training (HIIT) format. The mention of "high intensities" and a workout intensity level of 3 out of 3 supports a classification under "High-Energy & Intense" with a perfect score of 1.0. 

The image shows rowing on a river, aligning with the "Outdoor & Adventure" spirit. This setting, combined with the outdoor environment, complements the adventurous aspect, justifying a score of 0.7.

The playlist featuring energetic songs like "Heartlines" and "Monster" supports the intense and rhythm-driven nature of the session. No elements suggest a focus on rhythm without intensity, soothing qualities, or structured protocols, so other spirits were excluded.
